oai_dc:dc.dc:title: General Joseph Eggleston Johnston
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Carte de visite of General Joseph Eggleston Johnston. Head and shoulders portrait shows General Johnston in Confederate uniform. Photograph on page eight on the right side

Johnston, a graduate of the U. S. Military Academy, resigned his commission when his home state Virginia seceded. He entered the Confederate army as a brigadier general. Johnston's first victory came at the First Battle of Bull Run in July 1861, and it
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Carte de Visite Photograph Album, Civil War Portraits
